name: The Only One (IQuick143)
description:
A game made for the GMTKJAM2019 about the theme Only One

You're the only one in a weird world and you're trying to get back home while navigating using only walking.

Features:

  • Controls with ONLY ONE  mouse button
  • Intuitive mechanics
  • A platformer without a jump! (we missed the last jam so it's in here!)

Controls:

  • Move the mouse to the sides of the character and hold
  • R to restart a level (optional)

Credits:

Programming & Level Design (and gluing everything):

  • IQuick 143
  • Jaume Montagut Guix

3D modeling, Animating & Level Design:

  • Auariz

SFX & Sound Design:

  • Kez
